import { useState } from "react"; import "./header.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faBed, faCalendarDays, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; import "react-date-range/dist/styles.css"; // main css file import "react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css"; // theme css file import { format } from "date-fns"; const Header = () => { const [openDate, setOpenDate] = useState(false) const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: "selection", }, ]); return (
